attributes.description: Our clients become family for life because we value each of them dearly. At Mastercars we promise the following: 1.Guaranteed year model. 2. Guaranteed not stolen. 3. attributes.description:
Lindsay Saker has always been a part of your neighbourhood and a part of your life. We are South Africa's biggest Volkswagen, Audi, Select and Commercial vehicle dealer network.When you buy a Volkswagen, you know you are getting so much more than just a car. After Sales Service and support is the next stage in your journey. We are a committed dealer with world-class experts to ensure that you and your Volkswagen are always taken care of. We at Lindsay Saker Vereeniging is your dealer. 

We accept Trade We offer finance, all banks. All vehicles come with a Road worthy certificate, 80-Point check, Quality Valet
Price excludes any documentation fees and on road costs. . .

attributes.description:
This “Built Ford Tough” vehicle is the perfect partner for your business. Having the extra half-a-cab comes in handy where carrying valuable items or product that are not weatherproof behind the seats and a load bin which carries close to a ton. It is very user friendly. Features include: Fabric Seats, Aircon, Electric Windows, Electric Mirrors, canopy, Towbar, Rear Bin rubberizing, Alloy Wheels, CD Player, and much more. We take things a little more seriously at CBK Motors we do a full ABC Assessment on all vehicles. A: Body for dents, scratches and scuff marks. B: Overall Mechanical check over and C: Cosmetic and interior assessment for your buying pleasure! E&O 
COME AND VIEW!
Finance Can be Arranged! 
Trade-ins Accepted!
Please contact our friendly and professional sales team for assistance!
Office: 010 449 3410 
David : 067 131 6474
Zander: 065 830 9133
